      • GraphMLWriter

        public GraphMLWriter(java.io.Writer writer,
             int mode,
             boolean unproper,
             boolean html)
        Create a new GraphMLWriter
        Parameters:
        writer - where to write to
        mode - what should be written
        unproper - mark unproper inclusions
        html - output labels not in latex but in Java html
